item.title: About
item.description: This site was made using the code template created by the Stanford Data Challenge Lab team and is based off of their initial analysis for the state of California. The Hawaii site is maintained by the unBox team. If you have any feedback, comments, or suggestions for improvements to this site, please email us.

item.title: Hawaii
item.description: Overview Food insufficiency Rate over time Geography Demographics Reasons Severity Free groceries or meals Unemployment Rate over time Geography Unemployment and food insufficiency Overview The data on this site is derived from the U.S. Census Bureau Household Pulse Survey (HPS) and the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics Local Area Unemployment Statistics (LAUS).
